content:
Here is a Mermaid code to represent the state diagram of the attack:
```mermaid
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> AnonymizingServices: 1. Anonymizing Services (TOR, VPN) usage
    AnonymizingServices --> SSRFAttack: 2. SSRF attack & access to private server
    SSRFAttack --> WAFMisconfiguration: 3. WAF misconfiguration
    WAFMisconfiguration --> ObtainTemporaryCredentials: 4. Obtain temporary credentials
    ObtainTemporaryCredentials --> ListingS3Buckets: 5. Listing all S3 Buckets
    ListingS3Buckets --> DataExfiltration: 6. Data exfiltration from S3 buckets
    DataExfiltration --> [*]
```
Paste this code into a Mermaid-enabled Markdown editor or an online Mermaid renderer like [Mermaid Live Editor](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/) to visualize the state diagram.
